authmanager-authplugin-setpass-failed-ti: Title of error page from AuthManager if AuthPlugin returns false from its setPassword() method.
authmanager-authplugin-setpass-failed-me: Text of error page from AuthManager if AuthPlugin returns false from its setPassword() method.
authmanager-authplugin-create-fail: Error message from AuthManager if the AuthPlugin returns false from its addUser() method.
authmanager-authplugin-setpass-denied: Error message from AuthManager if the AuthPlugin returns false from its allowPasswordChange() method.
authmanager-authplugin-setpass-bad-domai: Error message from AuthManager if the AuthPlugin rejects the passed domain.
